Producer: Jason Weinberg, Jim Young, Heidi Jo Markel, Laura Rister
Production Co: Animus Films, Millennium Films, Untitled Entertainment, Eclectic Pictures, Telling Pictures
Rating: R (Language|Drug Use|Nudity|Some Domestic Violence|Strong Sexual Content)
Synopsis: After the release of "Deep Throat" in 1972, porn star Linda Lovelace (Amanda Seyfried) becomes an international sensation and spokeswoman for sexual freedom and hedonism; six years later, she presents a darker side to her story.
Title: Lovelace
